title: Greek Fire
description: Emma Connolly, just wanted to see her best friend get married. She wakes up locked in a cell. Taken by an evil Order, with one goal, steal the power of the gods. She had meant to surprise Aislin and that means no one is looking for her. She is thrown into a world of magic, myths and ancient beings. As she fights for her freedom, she meets someone determined to get his revenge. She is his key.Jason, is a science project, a guardian created by the gods to search and destroy. He loves Aislin and vows to find Emma. The girl with the beautiful voice, in it he hears things he has never dared to dream of. Cursed by someone who hates him, someone he knew nothing about, he is locked inside himself. Thousands of years ago the Fates foretold Jasonâ€™s destiny.She is his key.
author: S. Lawrence
